body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:sendFax>
            <userId>{{app_user_id}}</userId>
            <subject>Send Fax Minimal</subject>
            <comment>This is a sample comment</comment>
            <recipient>
                <number>+1-202-555-0129</number>
            </recipient>
        </ws:sendFax>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:sendFax>
            <userId>{{app_user_id}}</userId>
            <subject>Send Fax Cover Sheet</subject>
            <comment>This is a sample comment</comment>
            <recipient>
                <number>+1-202-555-0129</number>
            </recipient>
            <coverPage>Base01.cse</coverPage>
        </ws:sendFax>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:sendFax>
            <userId>{{app_user_id}}</userId>
            <subject>Send Fax Minimal HTML (Cloud Only)</subject>
            <comment>This is a sample comment with <strong>HTML</strong> <u>capabilities</u>. Tags need to be properly escaped.</comment>
            <recipient>
                <number>+1-202-555-0129</number>
            </recipient>
            <isCommentTypeHtml>true</isCommentTypeHtml>
        </ws:sendFax>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:sendFax>
            <userId>{{app_user_id}}</userId>
            <subject>Send Fax Basic</subject>
            <comment>This is a sample comment</comment>
            <recipient>
                <number>+1-202-555-0129</number>
                <name>John Doe</name>
                <company>OpenText Developer</company>
            </recipient>
            <attachment>
                <name>test.pdf</name>
                <contents></contents>
            </attachment>
            <coverPage>DEFAULT</coverPage>
        </ws:sendFax>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:sendFax>
            <userId>{{app_user_id}}</userId>
            <subject>Send Fax Full</subject>
            <comment>This is a sample comment</comment>
            <recipient>
                <number>+1-202-555-0129</number>
                <name>John Doe</name>
                <company>OpenText Developer</company>
            </recipient>
            <recipient>
                <number>+1-202-555-0128</number>
                <name>Jane Doe</name>
                <company>OpenText Developer</company>
            </recipient>
            <attachment>
                <name>test.pdf</name>
                <contents></contents>
            </attachment>
            <coverPage>DEFAULT</coverPage>
            <senderInfo>
                <salutation>Sender salutation</salutation>
                <firstName>Sender firstname</firstName>
                <lastName>Sender lastname</lastName>
                <title>Sender title</title>
                <email>Sender email</email>
                <mobile>Sender mobile</mobile>
                <pager>Sender pager</pager>
                <billingCode>Sender billingcode</billingCode>
                <subBillingCode>Sender subbillingcode</subBillingCode>
                <company>Sender company</company>
                <address>Sender address</address>
                <city>Sender city</city>
                <state>Sender state</state>
                <country>Sender country</country>
                <zipCode>Sender zipcode</zipCode>
                <phone>Sender phone</phone>
                <fax>Sender fax</fax>
            </senderInfo>
            <faxOptions>
                <priority>Normal</priority>
                <noOfRetries>3</noOfRetries>
                <resolution>High</resolution>
                <notifyOnSuccess>true</notifyOnSuccess>
                <notifyOnFailure>true</notifyOnFailure>
                <csid><!---- voir avec Laurent ou QA ---></csid>
                <notifyOnBroadcast>true</notifyOnBroadcast>
            </faxOptions>
            <additionalData>
                <custom1>Out Custom1</custom1>
                <custom2>Out Custom2</custom2>
                <custom3>Out Custom3</custom3>
                <custom4>Out Custom4</custom4>
                <custom5>Out Custom5</custom5>
            </additionalData>
            <isCommentTypeHtml>false</isCommentTypeHtml>
        </ws:sendFax>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:sendFaxLater>
            <userId>{{app_user_id}}</userId>
            <subject>Send Fax Later</subject>
            <comment>This is a sample comment</comment>
            <recipient>
                <number>+1-202-555-0129</number>
            </recipient>
            <coverPage>DEFAULT</coverPage>
            <delayUntil>2034-10-05T14:48:00.000Z</delayUntil>
        </ws:sendFaxLater>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:forward>
        <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Indbound Faxes" request -->
            <faxId>{{inbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
            <destination>
                <name>{{destination_user_name}}</name>
                <id>{{destination_user_id}}</id>
                <type>user</type>
            </destination>
        </ws:forward>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:forward>
            <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Inbound Faxes" request -->
            <faxId>{{inbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
            <destination>
                <!-- name and id come from the "Destinations of type mail" request results -->
                <name>{{destination_mail_name}}</name>
                <id>{{destination_mail_id}}</id>
                <type>mail</type>
            </destination>
        </ws:forward>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:resubmit>
            <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Outbound Faxes" request -->
            <faxId>{{outbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
        </ws:resubmit>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:resubmitLater>
            <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Outbound Faxes" request -->
            <faxId>{{outbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
            <destination>+1-202-555-0129</destination>
            <delayUntil>2034-10-05T14:48:00.000Z</delayUntil>
        </ws:resubmitLater>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:resubmitTo>
            <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Outbound Faxes" request -->
            <faxId>{{outbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
            <destination>+1-202-555-0129</destination>
        </ws:resubmitTo>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:cancel>
            <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Outgoing Fax" request -->
            <faxId>{{outgoing_fax_id}}</faxId>
        </ws:cancel>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:cancelBroadcast>
            <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Outgoing Faxes" request -->
            <faxId>{{outgoing_fax_id}}</faxId>
        </ws:cancelBroadcast>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:deletePermanently>
            <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Outbound Faxes" or from the "Find Inbound Faxes" request -->
            <faxId>{{outbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
        </ws:deletePermanently>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:retrySendingNow>
            <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Outgoing Faxes" request -->
            <faxId>{{outgoing_fax_id}}</faxId>
        </ws:retrySendingNow>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:markAsViewed>
            <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Outbound Faxes" or from the "Find Inbound Faxes" request -->
            <faxId>{{outbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
        </ws:markAsViewed>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:markAsUnviewed>
            <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Outbound Faxes" or from the "Find Inbound Faxes" request -->
            <faxId>{{outbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
        </ws:markAsUnviewed>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:markAsDeleted>
            <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Outbound Faxes" or from the "Find Inbound Faxes" request -->
            <faxId>{{outbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
        </ws:markAsDeleted>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:markAsUndeleted>
            <!-- faxId comes from the "Find Outbound Faxes" or from the "Find Inbound Faxes" request -->
            <faxId>{{outbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
        </ws:markAsUndeleted>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:saveNote>
            <!-- can be inbound or outbound fax ID -->
            <faxId>{{inbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
            <note>A text note</note>
        </ws:saveNote>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:setAdditionalData>
            <!-- can be inbound or outbound fax ID -->
            <faxId>{{inbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
            <custom1>Field 1</custom1>
            <custom2>Field 2</custom2>
            <custom3>Field 3</custom3>
            <custom4>Field 4</custom4>
            <custom5>Field 5</custom5>
        </ws:setAdditionalData>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:getAuditLogs>
      <!-- can be inbound or outbound fax ID -->
         <faxId>{{inbound_fax_id}}</faxId>
      </ws:getAuditLogs>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:setUserData>
            <userId>{{app_user_id}}</userId>
            <dataId>DEMO_KEY_ID</dataId>
            <data>
            <!-- Content needs to be encoded to XML entities -->
{
  "fax_limit": 10,
  "favorites": [
    "1-613-555-0184",
    "1-613-555-0148",
    "1-613-555-0177"
  ]
}
            </data>
        </ws:setUserData>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:setUserData>
            <userId>{{app_user_id}}</userId>
            <dataId>DEMO_KEY_ID</dataId>
            <data>
            <!-- Content needs to be encoded to XML entities -->
<fax_limit>10</fax_limit>
<favorites>1-613-555-0184</favorites>
<favorites>1-613-555-0148</favorites>
<favorites>1-613-555-0177</favorites>
            </data>
        </ws:setUserData>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:addContact>
            <userId>{{app_user_id}}</userId>
            <contact>
                <name>John Doe</name>
                <fax>+1-202-555-0129</fax>
                <organisation>OpenText</organisation>
                <billingCode>111</billingCode>
                <subBillingCode>2222</subBillingCode>
                <city>Waterloo</city>
                <country>Canada</country>
                <email>opentext@example.com</email>
                <title>Software Developer</title>
                <mobile>+1-202-555-0128</mobile>
                <pager>+1-202-555-0127</pager>
                <phone>+1-202-555-0126</phone>
                <zipCode>N2L 0A1</zipCode>
                <state>ON</state>
                <street>275 Frank Tompa Dr</street>
            </contact>
        </ws:addContact>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.xm.faxserver.com/">
    <soapenv:Header/>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <ws:updateContact>
            <userId>{{app_user_id}}</userId>
            <contact>
                <!-- ID values are from the Find Contacts request and assigned in the Tests tab -->
                <id>{{phone_book_contact_id_part1}}</id>
                <id>{{phone_book_contact_id_part2}}</id>
                <id>{{phone_book_contact_id_part3}}</id>
                <id>{{phone_book_contact_id_part4}}</id>
                <name>John Doe di dop</name>
                <fax>+1-202-555-0129</fax>
                <organisation>OpenText</organisation>
                <billingCode>111</billingCode>
                <subBillingCode>2222</subBillingCode>
                <city>Waterloo</city>
                <country>Canada</country>
                <email>opentext@example.com</email>
                <title>Software Developer</title>
                <mobile>+1-202-555-0128</mobile>
                <pager>+1-202-555-0127</pager>
                <phone>+1-202-555-0126</phone>
                <zipCode>N2L 0A1</zipCode>
                <state>ON</state>
                <street>275 Frank Tompa Dr</street>
            </contact>
        </ws:updateContact>
    </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>
